name: EVADER (eiya_kugumo_A)
description:
Left, Right: move(Can be changed to 'W+A+S' or 'Z+space+Right' in the settings)

Release Left and Right: Return to the center

Up: Shoot items when available

Esc: Back to the title

•Miss when the player collides with a block etc.

•Players do not collides with a blocks etc. from the side
